caption.center: RALPH GRAHAM, Appellant, v. STATE OF FLORIDA, Appellee.

court.center: District Court of Appeal of Florida, Second District.

opinion.posture: Appeal pursuant to Fla.R.App.P. 9.141(b)(2) from the Circuit Court for Sarasota County; Harry M. Rapkin, Judge.
opinion.opinion_text:
Affirmed. See Graham v. State, 825 So.2d 492 (Fla. 2d DCA 2002); Toneyv. State, 817 So.2d 924 (Fla. 2d DCA 2002) (en banc); Blake v. State,807 So.2d 772 (Fla. 2d DCA 2002); Brown v. State, 793 So.2d 27 (Fla. 2d DCA 2001).
DAVIS, COVINGTON, and VILLANTI, JJ., Concur.
NOT FINAL UNTIL TIME EXPIRES TO FILE REHEARING MOTION AND, IF FILED, DETERMINED.
